comments:
Details:
[SPM - RedHat Enterprise Linux WS 3.0]
Cannot open the report created in windows

Step:
1.New a report in windowsXP.
2.Insert a label and save.
3.Open the BIRT in Linux.
4.Use Open file to open the design was created in windowsXP

Actual result:
The design cannot be opened.
Expect result:
The design is opened.

Created an attachment (id=29684)
Test report
